SnapEnhance - An Xposed module offering an enhanced Snapchat experience

upload.js (546B) - raw

      1 const TelegramBot = require('node-telegram-bot-api');
      2 const program = require('commander');
      3 
      4 program
      5   .option('-t, --token <token>', 'Telegram bot token')
      6   .option('-f, --file <filePath>', 'File path of the file to send')
      7   .option('-c, --caption <caption>', 'Caption for the file')
      8   .option('--chatid <chatId>', 'Chat ID to send the file to')
      9   .parse(process.argv);
     10 
     11 const { token, chatid, file, caption } = program.opts();
     12 const bot = new TelegramBot(token);
     13 
     14 bot.sendDocument(chatid, file, { caption }).then(() => {
     15     process.exit();
     16 })
